about:
DevOps/SRE/DevSecOps Engineer with 5 years of experience in cloud-native deployments, automation, and secure CI/CD practices. Skilled in Jenkins, Harness, Docker, Kubernetes (AKS, OpenShift), and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure. 
I specialize in Infrastructure as Code using Terraform and Ansible, and have strong scripting skills in Bash, Groovy, and Python. 
Experienced in monitoring and observability with Prometheus, Grafana, and cAdvisor to ensure system reliability. 
I integrate security tools such as Checkmarx, Veracode, BlackDuck, Sysdig, and SonarQube into CI/CD pipelines for proactive vulnerability management. 
Proficient in secret management using Vault, CyberArk, and Crowd. 
I work within Agile frameworks (Scrum, Kanban) to deliver secure, scalable, and high-performing solutions across hybrid cloud environments
